snippet: A 66-year-old man died from Middle East Respiratory Syndrome, the first deadly case of the virus in Algeria, the Health Ministry said in a statement.
abstract: Algerian man dies from Middle East Respiratory Syndrome, the first deadly case of virus in Algeria, according to Health Ministry statement; was one of two people identified as having MERS following pilgrimage to Saudi Arabia.
lead_paragraph: A 66-year-old man died from Middle East Respiratory Syndrome, the first deadly case of the virus in Algeria, the Health Ministry said in a statement.
